snippet: Perhaps hoping to prevent a repeat of the summer of 2010, chief minister moves swiftly.
abstract: Perhaps hoping to prevent a repeat of the summer of 2010, chief minister moves swiftly.
lead_paragraph: The government of Jammu and Kashmir took swift action after security forces killed an 18-year-old male Monday, arresting five men in connection with the shooting.

headline.main: Quick Action in Kashmir After Shooting
